comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Looks like this is Richard L. Metcalfe, of Nebraska, who turns up in a bunch of NYTimes articles for his political and journalistic activity and his role as Governor of the Panama Canal Zone. Associate of William Jennings Bryant. Here is entry and photo in Wikipedia, looks like the same man. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Lee_Metcalfe

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Harry Angstrom:  Looks like your are right about the name and identity of this man.  Thanks for your information.  We will add it to the source data and reload the description.
